items.name: Data Source Identifier
items.comment: Identification of the system sending the data

data_fields.name: SAC
data_fields.comment: System Area Code

data_fields.name: SIC
data_fields.comment: System Identification Code

items.name: Service Identification
items.comment: Identification of the service provided to one or more users.

items.name: Track Number
items.comment: Identification of a track

items.name: Track Mode 3/A Code
items.comment: Mode-3/A code converted into octal representation.

items.name: CH
items.comment:
Change in Mode 3/A
0 No Change
1 Mode 3/A has changed

items.name: Time Of Track Information
items.comment: Absolute time stamping of the information provided in the track message, in the form of elapsed time since last midnight, expressed as UTC.

items.name: Track Status
items.comment: Status of a track.

items.name: MON
items.comment:
0 Multisensor track
1 Monosensor track

items.name: SPI
items.comment:
0 default value
1 SPI present in the last report received from a sensor capable of decoding this data

items.name: MRH
items.comment:
Most Reliable Height
0 Barometric altitude (Mode C) more reliable
1 Geometric altitude more reliable

items.name: SRC
items.comment:
Source of calculated track altitude for I062/130
0 no source
1 GNSS
2 3D radar
3 triangulation
4 height from coverage
5 speed look-up table
6 default height
7 multilateration

items.name: CNF
items.comment:
0 Confirmed track
1 Tentative track

items.name: SIM
items.comment:
0 Actual track
1 Simulated track

items.name: TSE
items.comment:
0 default value
1 last message transmitted to the user for the track

items.name: TSB
items.comment:
0 default value
1 first message transmitted to the user for the track

items.name: FPC
items.comment:
0 Not flight-plan correlated
1 Flight plan correlated

items.name: AFF
items.comment:
0 default value
1 ADS-B data inconsistent with other surveillance information

items.name: STP
items.comment:
0 default value
1 Slave Track Promotion

items.name: KOS
items.comment:
0 Complementary service used
1 Background service used

items.name: AMA
items.comment:
0 track not resulting from amalgamation process
1 track resulting from amalgamation process

items.name: MD4
items.comment:
0 No Mode 4 interrogation
1 Friendly target
2 Unknown target
3 No reply

items.name: ME
items.comment:
0 default value
1 Military Emergency present in the last report received from a sensor capable of decoding this data

items.name: MI
items.comment:
0 default value
1 Military Identification present in the last report received from a sensor capable of decoding this data

items.name: MD5
items.comment:
0 No Mode 5 interrogation
1 Friendly target
2 Unknown target
3 No reply

items.name: CST
items.comment:
0 Default value
1 Age of the last received track update is higher than system dependent threshold (coasting)

items.name: PSR
items.comment:
0 Default value
1 Age of the last received PSR track update is higher than system dependent threshold

items.name: SSR
items.comment:
0 Default value
1 Age of the last received SSR track update is higher than system dependent threshold

items.name: MDS
items.comment:
0 Default value
1 Age of the last received Mode S track update is higher than system dependent threshold

items.name: ADS
items.comment:
0 Default value
1 Age of the last received ADS-B track update is higher than system dependent threshold

items.name: SUC
items.comment:
0 Default value
1 Special Used Code (Mode A codes to be defined in the system to mark a track with special interest)

items.name: AAC
items.comment:
0 Default value
1 Assigned Mode A Code Conflict (same discrete Mode A Code assigned to another track)

items.name: Calculated Track Position. (Cartesian)
items.comment: Calculated position in Cartesian co-ordinates with a resolution of 0.5m, in two’s complement form.

items.name: Calculated Position In WGS-84 Co-ordinates
items.comment: Calculated Position in WGS-84 Co-ordinates with a resolution of 180/2^25. degrees

data_fields.name: Latitude
data_fields.comment: In WGS.84 in two’s complement. Range -90 <= latitude <= 90 deg.

data_fields.name: Longitude
data_fields.comment: In WGS.84 in two’s complement. Range -180 <= longitude < 180 deg.

items.name: Mode 5 Data reports & Extended Mode 1 Code
items.comment: Mode 5 Data reports & Extended Mode 1 Code

items.name: M5
items.comment:
0 No Mode 5 interrogation
1 Mode 5 interrogation

items.name: ID
items.comment:
0 No authenticated Mode 5 ID reply
1 Authenticated Mode 5 ID reply

items.name: DA
items.comment:
0 No authenticated Mode 5 Data reply or Report
 1 Authenticated Mode 5 Data reply or Report (i.e any valid Mode 5 reply type other than ID)

items.name: M1
items.comment:
0 Mode 1 code not present or not from Mode 5 reply
 1 Mode 1 code from Mode 5 reply.

items.name: M2
items.comment:
0 Mode 2 code not present or not from Mode 5 reply
 1 Mode 2 code from Mode 5 reply.

items.name: M3
items.comment:
0 Mode 3 code not present or not from Mode 5 reply
 1 Mode 3 code from Mode 5 reply.

items.name: MC
items.comment:
0 Mode C altitude not present or not from Mode 5 reply
1 Mode C altitude from Mode 5 reply

items.name: X
items.comment:
X-pulse from Mode 5 Data reply or Report.
0 X-pulse set to zero or no authenticated Data reply or Report received.
1 X-pulse set to one.

items.name: PMN
items.comment: Mode 5 PIN /National Origin/ Mission Code

data_fields.name: PIN
data_fields.comment: PIN Code

data_fields.name: NAT
data_fields.comment: National Origin

data_fields.name: MIS
data_fields.comment: Mission Code

items.name: POS
items.comment: Mode 5 Reported Position

data_fields.name: Latitude
data_fields.comment: In WGS.84 in two’s complement. Range -90 <= latitude <= 90 deg.

data_fields.name: Longitude
data_fields.comment: In WGS.84 in two’s complement. Range -180 <= longitude < 180 deg.

items.name: GA
items.comment: Mode 5 GNSS-derived Altitude

items.name: RES
items.comment:
Resolution with which the GNSS-derived Altitude (GA) is reported.
0 GA reported in 100 ft increments,
1 GA reported in 25 ft increments.

items.name: GA
items.comment: GNSS-derived Altitude of target, expressed as height above WGS 84 ellipsoid.

items.name: EM1
items.comment: Extended Mode 1 Code in Octal Representation

data_fields.name: Extended Mode 1 Code
data_fields.comment: Extended Mode 1 Code in octal representation

items.name: TOS
items.comment: Time Offset for POS and GA

data_fields.name: TOS
data_fields.comment: Time Offset coded as a twos complement number with an LSB of 1/128 s. The time at which the Mode 5 Reported Position (Subfield #3) and Mode 5 GNSS- derived Altitude (Subfield #4) are valid is given by Time of Day (I048/140) plus Time Offset.

items.name: XP
items.comment: X Pulse Presence

items.name: X5
items.comment:
X-pulse from Mode 5 Data reply or Report.
0 X-pulse set to zero or no authenticated Data reply or Report received.
1 X-pulse set to one (present).

items.name: XC
items.comment:
X-pulse from Mode C reply
0 X-pulse set to zero or no Mode C reply
1 X-pulse set to one (present)

items.name: X3
items.comment:
X-pulse from Mode 3/A reply
0 X-pulse set to zero or no Mode 3/A reply
1 X-pulse set to one (present)

items.name: X2
items.comment:
X-pulse from Mode 2 reply
0 X-pulse set to zero or no Mode 2 reply
1 X-pulse set to one (present)

items.name: X1
items.comment:
X-pulse from Mode 1 reply
0 X-pulse set to zero or no Mode 1 reply
1 X-pulse set to one (present)

items.name: Track Mode 2 Code
items.comment: Mode 2 code associated to the track

items.name: Calculated Track Geometric Altitude
items.comment: Vertical distance between the target and the projection of its position on the earth’s ellipsoid, as defined by WGS84, in two’s complement form.

data_fields.name: Altitude
data_fields.comment:
Vmin = -1500 ft
Vmax = 150000 ft

items.name: Calculated Track Barometric Altitude
items.comment: Calculated Barometric Altitude of the track, in two’s complement form.

items.name: QNH
items.comment:
0 No QNH correction applied
1 QNH correction applied

items.name: Calculated Track Barometric Altitude
items.comment:
Vmin = -15 FL
Vmax = 1500 FL

items.name: Measured Flight Level
items.comment: Last valid and credible flight level used to update the track, in two’s complement form,.

data_fields.name: Measured Flight Level
data_fields.comment:
Vmin = -15 FL
Vmax = 1500 FL

items.name: Calculated Track Velocity (Cartesian)
items.comment: Calculated track velocity expressed in Cartesian co-ordinates, in two’s complement form.

items.name: Mode of Movement
items.comment: Calculated Mode of Movement of a target.

items.name: TRANS
items.comment:
Transversal Acceleration :
0 Constant Course
1 Right Turn
2 Left Turn
3 Undetermined

items.name: LONG
items.comment:
Longitudinal Acceleration :
0 Constant Groundspeed
1 Increasing Groundspeed
2 Decreasing Groundspeed
3 Undetermined

items.name: VERT
items.comment:
Vertical Rate :
0 Level
1 Climb
2 Descent
3 Undetermined

items.name: ADF
items.comment:
Altitude Discrepancy Flag
0 No altitude discrepancy
1 Altitude discrepancy

items.name: Calculated Acceleration (Cartesian)
items.comment: Calculated Acceleration of the target expressed in Cartesian co-ordinates, in two’s complement form.

items.name: Calculated Rate Of Climb/Descent
items.comment: Calculated rate of Climb/Descent of an aircraft in two’s complement form.

items.name: Target Identification
items.comment: Target (aircraft or vehicle) identification in 8 characters.

items.name: STI
items.comment:
0 Callsign or registration downlinked from target
1 Callsign not downlinked from target
2 Registration not downlinked from target
3 Invalid

items.name: Target Size & Orientation
items.comment: Target size defined as length and width of the detected target, and orientation.

items.name: LENGTH
items.comment: When the length only is sent, the largest dimension is provided.

items.name: ORIENTATION
items.comment: The orientation gives the direction which the target nose is pointing to, relative to the Geographical North.

items.name: System Track Update Ages
items.comment: Ages of the last plot/local track/target report update for each sensor type.

data_fields.name: Age
data_fields.comment: Actual track age since occurence

data_fields.name: Age
data_fields.comment: Age of the last primary detection used to update the track

data_fields.name: Age
data_fields.comment: Age of the last secondary detection used to update the track

data_fields.name: Age
data_fields.comment: Age of the last Mode S detection used to update the track

data_fields.name: Age
data_fields.comment: Age of the last ADS-C report used to update the track

data_fields.name: Age
data_fields.comment: Age of the last 1090 Extended Squitter ADS-B report used to update the track

data_fields.name: Age
data_fields.comment: Age of the last VDL Mode 4 ADS-B report used to update the track

data_fields.name: Age
data_fields.comment: Age of the last UAT ADS-B report used to update the track

data_fields.name: Age
data_fields.comment: Age of the last magnetic loop detection

data_fields.name: Age
data_fields.comment: Age of the last MLT detection

items.name: Track Data Ages
items.comment: Ages of the data provided.

data_fields.name: Age
data_fields.comment: Age of the last valid and credible Mode C code or barometric altitude from ADS-B used to update the track (I062/136)

data_fields.name: Age
data_fields.comment: Age of the last valid and credible Mode 1 code used to update the track (I062/110)

data_fields.name: Age
data_fields.comment: Age of the last valid and credible Mode 2 code used to update the track (I062/120)

data_fields.name: Age
data_fields.comment: Age of the last valid and credible Mode 3/A code used to update the track (I062/060)

data_fields.name: Age
data_fields.comment: Age of the last valid and credible Mode 4 code used to update the track

data_fields.name: Age
data_fields.comment: Age of the last valid and credible Mode 5 code used to update the track (I062/110)

data_fields.name: Age
data_fields.comment: Age of the DAP "Magnetic Heading" in item 062/380 (Subfield #3)

data_fields.name: Age
data_fields.comment: Age of the DAP "Indicated Airspeed/ Mach Number" in item 062/380 (Subfield #4)

data_fields.name: Age
data_fields.comment: Age of the DAP "True Airspeed" in item 062/380 (Subfield #5)

data_fields.name: Age
data_fields.comment: Age of the DAP "Selected Altitude" in item 062/380 (Subfield #6)

data_fields.name: Age
data_fields.comment: Age of the DAP "Final State Selected Altitude" in item 062/380 (Subfield #7)

data_fields.name: Age
data_fields.comment: Age of the DAP "Trajectory Intent" in item 062/380 (Subfield #8)

data_fields.name: Age
data_fields.comment: Age of the DAP "Communication/ACAS Capability and Flight Status" in item 062/380 (Subfield #10)

data_fields.name: Age
data_fields.comment: Age of the DAP "Status Reported by ADS-B" in item 062/380 (Subfield #11)

data_fields.name: Age
data_fields.comment: Age of the DAP "ACAS Resolution Advisory Report" in item 062/380 (Subfield #12)

data_fields.name: Age
data_fields.comment: Age of the DAP "Barometric Vertical Rate" in item 062/380 (Subfield #13)

data_fields.name: Age
data_fields.comment: Age of the DAP "Geometrical Vertical Rate" in item 062/380 (Subfield #14)

data_fields.name: Age
data_fields.comment: Age of the DAP "Roll Angle" in item 062/380 (Subfield #15)

data_fields.name: Age
data_fields.comment: Age of the DAP "Track Angle Rate" in item 062/380 (Subfield #16)

data_fields.name: Age
data_fields.comment: Age of the DAP "Track Angle" in item 062/380 (Subfield #17)

data_fields.name: Age
data_fields.comment: Age of the DAP "Ground Speed" in item 062/380 (Subfield #18)

data_fields.name: Age
data_fields.comment: Age of the DAP "Velocity Uncertainty" in item 062/380 (Subfield #19)

data_fields.name: Age
data_fields.comment: Age of the DAP "Meteorological Data" in item 062/380 (Subfield #20)

data_fields.name: Age
data_fields.comment: Age of the DAP "Emitter Category" in item 062/380 (Subfield #21)

data_fields.name: Age
data_fields.comment: Age of the DAP "Position" in item 062/380 (Subfield #23)

data_fields.name: Age
data_fields.comment: Age of the DAP "Geometric Altitude" in item 062/380 (Subfield #24)

data_fields.name: Age
data_fields.comment: Age of the DAP "Position Uncertainty" in item 062/380 (Subfield #25)

data_fields.name: Age
data_fields.comment: Age of the DAP "Mode S MB Data" in item 062/380 (Subfield #22)

data_fields.name: Age
data_fields.comment: Age of the DAP "Indicated Airspeed" in item 062/380 (Subfield #26)

data_fields.name: Age
data_fields.comment: Age of the DAP "Mach Number" in item 062/380 (Subfield #27)

data_fields.name: Age
data_fields.comment: Age of the DAP "Barometric Pressure Setting" in item 062/380 (Subfield #28)

items.name: Vehicle Fleet Identification
items.comment: Vehicle fleet identification number.

data_fields.name: VFI
data_fields.comment:
0 Unknown
1 ATC equipment maintenance
2 Airport maintenance
3 Fire
4 Bird scarer
5 Snow plough
6 Runway sweeper
7 Emergency
8 Police
9 Bus
10 Tug (push/tow)
11 Grass cutter
12 Fuel
13 Baggage
14 Catering
15 Aircraft maintenance
16 Flyco (follow me)

items.name: Measured Information
items.comment: All measured data related to the last report used to update the track. These data are not used for ADS-B.

data_fields.name: SAC
data_fields.comment: System Area Code

data_fields.name: SIC
data_fields.comment: System Identification Code

data_fields.name: RHO
data_fields.comment: Max. range = 256 NM

data_fields.name: HEIGHT
data_fields.comment: Measured 3-D Height

items.name: V
items.comment:
0 Code validated
1 Code not validated

items.name: G
items.comment:
0 Default
1 Garbled code

items.name: Last Measured Mode C Code
items.comment:
Last Measured Mode C Code, in two's complement form
Vmin = -12 FL
Vmax = 1270 FL

items.name: V
items.comment:
0 Code validated
1 Code not validated

items.name: G
items.comment:
0 Default
1 Garbled code

items.name: L
items.comment:
0 Mode-3/A code derived from the reply of the transponder
1 Mode-3/A code not extracted during the last scan

items.name: TYP
items.comment:
000 No detection
001 Single PSR detection
010 Single SSR detection
011 SSR + PSR detection
100 Single ModeS All-Call
101 Single ModeS Roll-Call
110 ModeS All-Call + PSR
111 ModeS Roll-Call +PSR

items.name: SIM
items.comment:
0  Actual target report
1 Simulated target report

items.name: RAB
items.comment:
0 Report from aircraft transponder
1 Report from field monitor(fixed transponder)

items.name: TST
items.comment:
0 Real target report
 1 Test target report

items.name: Aircraft Derived Data
items.comment: Data derived directly by the aircraft.

data_fields.name: Target Address
data_fields.comment: 24 bits Target Address

items.name: Target Identification
items.comment: Characters 1-8 (coded on 6 bits each) defining a target identification when flight plan is available or the registration marking when no flight plan is available.

items.name: IM
items.comment:
0 Air Speed = IAS, LSB (Bit-1) = 2^-14 NM/s
1 Air Speed = Mach, LSB (Bit-1) = 0.001

items.name: Air Speed
items.comment: Air Speed (IAS or Mach)

data_fields.name: True Airspeed
data_fields.comment: 0 <= True Air Speed <= 2046 knots

data_fields.name: Selected Altitude
data_fields.comment: The short-term vertical intent as described by either the FMS selected altitude, the Altitude Control Panel Selected Altitude (FCU/MCP), or the current aircraft altitude according to the aircraft's mode of flight.

items.name: SAS
items.comment:
0 No source information provided
1 Source Information provided

items.name: Source
items.comment:
0 Unknown
01 Aircraft Altitude
2 FCU/MCP Selected Altitude
3 FMS Selected Altitude

items.name: Altitude
items.comment:
Altitude in two’s complement form
-1300ft <= Altitude <= 100000ft

data_fields.name: Final State Selected Altitude
data_fields.comment: The vertical intent value that corresponds with the ATC cleared altitude, as derived from the Altitude Control Panel (FCU/MCP).

items.name: MV
items.comment:
Manage Vertical Mode
0 Not active
1 Active

items.name: AH
items.comment:
Altitude Hold
0 Not active
1 Active

items.name: AM
items.comment:
Approach Mode
0 Not active
1 Active

items.name: Altitude
items.comment:
Altitude in two’s complement form
-1300ft <= Altitude <= 100000ft

items.name: NAV
items.comment:
0 Trajectory Intent Data is available for this aircraft
1 Trajectory Intent Data is not available for this aircraft

items.name: NVB
items.comment:
0 Trajectory Intent Data is valid
1 Trajectory Intent Data is not valid

items.name: TCA
items.comment:
0 TCP number available
1 TCP number not available

items.name: NC
items.comment:
0 TCP compliance
1 TCP non-compliance

items.name: TCP number
items.comment: Trajectory Change Point number

items.name: Altitude
items.comment: -1500 ft <= altitude <= 150000 ft

items.name: Latitude
items.comment:
In WGS.84 in two's complement.
-90 <= latitude <= 90 deg.

items.name: Longitude
items.comment:
In WGS.84 in two's complement.
-180 <= latitude < 180

items.name: Point Type
items.comment:
0 Unknown
1 Fly by waypoint (LT)
2 Fly over waypoint (LT)
3 Hold = 4 Procedure hold (LT)
5 Procedure turn (LT)
6 RF leg (LT)
7 Top of climb (VT)
8 Top of descent (VT)
9 Start of level (VT)
10 Cross-over altitude (VT)
11 Transition altitude (VT)

items.name: TD
items.comment:
0 N/A
 1 Turn right
2 Turn left
3 No turn

items.name: TRA
items.comment:
Turn Radius Availability
0 TTR not available
1 TTR available

items.name: TOA
items.comment:
0 TOV avilable
1 TOV not available

items.name: TOV
items.comment: Time Over Point

items.name: TTR
items.comment:
TCP Turn radius
0 <= TTR <= 655.35 Nm

data_fields.name: Communications/ACAS Capability and Flight Status reported by Mode-S

items.name: COM
items.comment:
Communications capability of the transponder
0 No communications capability (surveillance only)
1 Comm. A and Comm. B capability
2 Comm. A, Comm. B and Uplink ELM
3 Comm. A, Comm. B, Uplink ELM and Downlink ELM
4 Level 5 Transponder capability
5 to 7 Not assigned

items.name: STAT
items.comment:
Flight Status
0 No alert, no SPI, aircraft airborne
1 No alert, no SPI, aircraft on ground
2 Alert, no SPI, aircraft airborne
3 Alert, no SPI, aircraft on ground
4 Alert, SPI, aircraft airborne or on ground
5 No alert, SPI, aircraft airborne or on ground

items.name: SSC
items.comment:
Specific Service Capability
0 No
1 Yes

items.name: ARC
items.comment:
Altitude reporting capability
0 100 ft resolution
1 25 ft resolution

items.name: AIC
items.comment:
Aircraft identification capability
0 No
1 Yes

items.name: B1A
items.comment: BDS 1,0 bit 16

items.name: B1B
items.comment: BDS 1,0 bits 37/40

items.name: AC
items.comment:
0 unknown
1 ACAS not operational
2 ACAS operational
3 invalid

items.name: MN
items.comment:
0 unknown
1 Multiple navigational aids not operating
2 Multiple navigational aids operating
3 invalid

items.name: DC
items.comment:
0 unknown
1 Differential correction
2 No differential correction
3 invalid

items.name: GBS
items.comment:
0 Transponder Ground Bit not set or unknown
1 Transponder Ground Bit set

items.name: STAT
items.comment:
Flight Status
0 No emergency
1 General emergency
2 Lifeguard / medical
3 Minimum fuel
4 No communications
5 Unlawful interference
6 "Downed" Aircraft
7 Unknown

items.name: ACS
items.comment: Currently active Resolution Advisory (RA), if any, generated by the ACAS associated with the transponder transmitting the report and threat identity data.

data_fields.name: MB Data
data_fields.comment: 56-bit message conveying Mode S Comm B message data of BDS Register 3,0

data_fields.name: Roll Angle
data_fields.comment: Roll Angle in two’s complement form, -180 <= Roll Angle <= 180

items.name: TI
items.comment:
Turn Indicator
0 Not available
1 Left
2 Right
3 Straight

items.name: Rate of Turn
items.comment:
Rate of Turn in two’s complement form
-15 °/s <= Rate of Turn <= 15 °/s

data_fields.name: Ground Speed
data_fields.comment:
Ground Speed in two's complement form referenced to WGS84
-2 NM/s <= Ground Speed < 2 NM/s

data_fields.name: Wind Speed
data_fields.comment: 0 <= Wind Speed <= 300

data_fields.name: Wind Direction
data_fields.comment: 1 <= Wind Direction <= 360

data_fields.name: Temperature
data_fields.comment:
Temperature in degrees celsius
-100 °C <= Temperature <= 100 °C

data_fields.name: Turbulence
data_fields.comment: Integer between 0 and 15 inclusive

data_fields.name: ECAT
data_fields.comment:
1 light aircraft ≤ 7000 kg
2 reserved
3 7000 kg < medium aircraft < 136000 kg
4 reserved
5 136000 kg ≤ heavy aircraft
6 highly manoeuvrable (5g acceleration capability) and high speed (>400 knots cruise)
7 to 9 reserved
10 rotocraft
11 glider / sailplane
12 lighter-than-air
13 unmanned aerial vehicle
14 space / transatmospheric vehicle
15 ultralight / handglider / paraglider
16 parachutist / skydiver
17 to 19 reserved
20 surface emergency vehicle
21 surface service vehicle
22 fixed ground or tethered obstruction
23 to 24 reserved

data_fields.name: Latitude
data_fields.comment:
In WGS.84 in two’s complement form.
Range -90 <= latitude <= 90 deg.

data_fields.name: Longitude
data_fields.comment:
In WGS.84 in two’s complement form.
Range -180 <= longitude < 180 deg.

data_fields.name: Geometric Altitude
data_fields.comment:
Altitude in two's complement form
-1500 ft <= Altitude <= 150000 ft

items.name: MB Data
items.comment: 56-bit message conveying Mode S Comm B message data

items.name: BDS1
items.comment: Comm B Data Buffer Store 1 Address

items.name: BDS2
items.comment: Comm B Data Buffer Store 2 Address

data_fields.name: Indicated Air Speed
data_fields.comment: 0 Kt <= Indicated Airspeed <= 1100 Kt

data_fields.name: Mach Number
data_fields.comment: 0 <= Mach Number <= 4.096

data_fields.name: Barometric Pressure Setting
data_fields.comment: BPS is the barometric pressure setting of the aircraft minus 800 mb.

items.name: Flight Plan Related Data
items.comment: All flight plan related information, provided by ground-based systems.

data_fields.name: SAC
data_fields.comment: System Area Code

data_fields.name: SIC
data_fields.comment: System Identity Code

items.name: TYP
items.comment:
0 Plan Number
1 Unit 1 internal flight number
2 Unit 2 internal flight number
3 Unit 3 internal flight number

items.name: NBR
items.comment: Number from 0 to 99 999 999

items.name: GAT/OAT
items.comment:
0 Unknown
1 General Air Traffic
2 Operational Air Traffic
3 Not applicable

items.name: FR1/FR2
items.comment:
0 Instrument Flight Rules
1 Visual Flight Rules
2 Not applicable
3 Controlled Visual Flight Rules

items.name: RVSM
items.comment:
0 Unknown
1 Approved
2 Exempt
3 Not Approved

items.name: HPR
items.comment:
0 Normal Priority Flight
1 High Priority Flight

items.name: RDS
items.comment: Runway Designation

data_fields.name: NU1
data_fields.comment: First number

data_fields.name: NU2
data_fields.comment: Second number

data_fields.name: LTR
data_fields.comment: Letter

items.name: CFL
items.comment: Current Cleared Flight Level

items.name: CTL
items.comment: Current Control Position

data_fields.name: Centre
data_fields.comment: 8-bit group Identification code

data_fields.name: Position
data_fields.comment: 8-bit Control Position identification code

items.name: TOD
items.comment: Time of Departure / Arrival

items.name: TYP
items.comment:
0 Scheduled off-block time
1 Estimated off-block time
2 Estimated take-off time
3 Actual off-block time
4 Predicted time at runway hold
5 Actual time at runway hold
6 Actual line-up time
7 Actual take-off time
8 Estimated time of arrival
9 Predicted landing time
10 Actual landing time
11 Actual time off runway
12 Predicted time to gate
13 Actual on-block time

items.name: DAY
items.comment:
0 Today
1 Yesterday
2 Tomorrow
3 Invalid

items.name: HOR
items.comment: Hours, from 0 to 23

items.name: MIN
items.comment: Minutes, from 0 to 59

items.name: AVS
items.comment:
0 Seconds available
1 Seconds not available

items.comment: Seconds, from 0 to 59

items.comment:
0 Empty
1 Occupied
2 Unknown
3 Invalid

0 Available

Validity
0 No valid Mode 3/A available

items.name: Estimated Accuracies
items.comment: Overview of all important accuracies

items.name: APC
items.comment: Estimated Accuracy Of Track Position (Cartesian)

data_fields.name: APC (X-Component)
data_fields.comment: Estimated accuracy (i.e. standard deviation) of the calculated position of a target expressed in Cartesian co-ordinates.

data_fields.name: APC (Y-Component)
data_fields.comment: Estimated accuracy (i.e. standard deviation) of the calculated position of a target expressed in Cartesian co-ordinates.

items.name: COV
items.comment: XY covariance component

data_fields.name: COV (XY Covariance Component)
data_fields.comment: XY Covariance Component in two’s complement form

items.name: APW
items.comment: Estimated Accuracy Of Track Position (WGS-84)

data_fields.name: APW (Latitude Component)
data_fields.comment: Estimated accuracy (i.e. standard deviation) of the calculated position of a target expressed in WGS-84.

data_fields.name: APW (Longitude Component)
data_fields.comment: Estimated accuracy (i.e. standard deviation) of the calculated position of a target expressed in WGS-84.

items.name: AGA
items.comment: Estimated Accuracy Of Calculated Track Geometric Altitude

data_fields.name: AGA
data_fields.comment: Estimated accuracy (i.e. standard deviation) of the calculated geometric altitude of a target.

items.name: ABA
items.comment: Estimated Accuracy Of Calculated Track Barometric Altitude

data_fields.name: ABA
data_fields.comment: Estimated accuracy (i.e. standard deviation) of the calculated barometric altitude of the track.

items.name: ATV
items.comment: Estimated Accuracy Of Track Velocity (Cartesian)

data_fields.name: ATV (X-Component)
data_fields.comment: Estimated accuracy (i.e. standard deviation) of the calculated track velocity in Cartesian co-ordinates.

data_fields.name: ATV (Y-Component)
data_fields.comment: Estimated accuracy (i.e. standard deviation) of the calculated track velocity in Cartesian co-ordinates.

items.name: AA
items.comment: Estimated Accuracy Of Acceleration (Cartesian)

data_fields.name: AA (X-Component)
data_fields.comment: Estimated accuracy (i.e. standard deviation) of the calculated acceleration in Cartesian co-ordinates.

data_fields.name: AA (Y-Component)
data_fields.comment: Estimated accuracy (i.e. standard deviation) of the calculated acceleration in Cartesian co-ordinates.

items.name: ARC
items.comment: Estimated Accuracy Of Rate Of Climb/Descent

data_fields.name: ARC
data_fields.comment: Estimated accuracy (i.e. standard deviation) of the calculated rate of Climb/Descent of an aircraft.
